# PoolTogether Hyperstructure Hooks

Shared React hooks specific to Hyperstructure functionality, using [WAGMI](https://wagmi.sh/).

![version](https://img.shields.io/github/package-json/v/pooltogether/pooltogether-client-monorepo?filename=packages%2Fpt-hyperstructure-hooks%2Fpackage.json&color=brightgreen)

![TypeScript](https://img.shields.io/badge/typescript-%23007ACC.svg?style=flat&logo=typescript&logoColor=white)
![ethers](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label&logo=ethereum&logoColor=white&message=ethers.js&color=gray)
![React](https://img.shields.io/badge/react-%2320232a.svg?style=flat&logo=react&logoColor=%2361DAFB)

![pt-client-js](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&message=pt-client-js&color=8050E3)
![pt-generic-hooks](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&message=pt-generic-hooks&color=8050E3)
![pt-utilities](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&message=pt-utilities&color=8050E3)
![pt-types](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&message=pt-types&color=8050E3)

## App Hooks

- `useCachedVaultLists`
- `useSelectedVaultLists`
- `useSelectedVaults`
- `useSelectedVault`

## Blockchain Hooks

- `useGasCostEstimates`
- `useGasPrices`
- `useProviderChainId`
- `useProviderChainIds`
- `useProviders`
- `useProvidersByChain`
- `useTokenAllowances`
- `useTokenBalances`
- `useTokens`

## Prize Pool Hooks

- `useAllPrizeInfo`
- `useLargestGrandPrize`
- `usePrizePools`
- `usePrizeTokenData`

## Transaction Hooks

- `useSendApproveTransaction`
- `useSendDepositToTransaction`
- `useSendDepositTransaction`
- `useSendWithdrawToTransaction`
- `useSendWithdrawTransaction`

## Vault Hooks

- `useAllUserVaultBalances`
- `useAllVaultBalances`
- `useAllVaultExchangeRates`
- `useAllVaultShareData`
- `useAllVaultTokenAddresses`
- `useAllVaultTokenData`
- `useUserVaultBalance`
- `useVault`
- `useVaultBalance`
- `useVaultExchangeRate`
- `useVaults`
- `useVaultShareData`
- `useVaultSharePrice`
- `useVaultTokenAddress`
- `useVaultTokenData`
- `useVaultTokenPrice`
